T02msitvatu:2: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma /
T02msitvatu:3: śītavane mahāśmaśāne iṅghikāyatanapratyuddeśe tatrāyuṣmān rāhulo 'tīva viheṭhyate /
T02msitvatu:4: devagrahair nāgagrahair yakṣagrahai rākṣagrahair marutagrahair asuragrahair kinnaragrahair
T02msitvatu:5: garuḍagrahair gandharvagrahair mahoragagrahair manuṣyagrahair amanuṣyagrahair pretagrahair
T02msitvatu:6: bhūtagrahair piśācagrahair kumbhāṇḍagrahair dvīpibhiḥ kākair ulūkaiḥ kīṭaiḥ sarīsṛpair
T02msitvatu:8: athāyuṣmān rāhulo yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ purato rudann aśrūṇi pravartayati sma /
T02msitvatu:9: atha bhagavān jānann eva rāhulam āmantrayate sma /
T02msitvatu:10: kiṃ tvaṃ rāhula mama prataḥ sthitvā aśrūṇi pravartayasi /
T02msitvatu:11: evam ukte āyuṣmān rāhulo bhagavantam etad avocat /
T02msitvatu:12: ihāhaṃ bhagavan rājagṛhe viharāmi śītavane mahāśmaśāne iṅghikāyatanapratyuddeśe (Mś_2)
T02msitvatu:14: devagrahair nāgagrahair yakṣagrahai rākṣasagrahair marutagrahair asuragrahair kinnaragrahair
T02msitvatu:15: garuḍagrahair gandharvagrahair mahoragagrahair manuṣyagrahair amanuṣyagrahair pretagrahair
T02msitvatu:16: bhūtagrahair piśācagrahair kumbhāṇḍagrahair dvīpibhiḥ kākair ulūkaiḥ kīṭaiḥ sarīsṛpair
T02msitvatu:18: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ rāhulam āmantrayate sma /
T02msitvatu:19: udgṛhṇa tvaṃ rāhula imāṃ mahāśītavatī nāma dhāraṇīṃ vidyāṃ /
T02msitvatu:20: catasṛṇāṃ pariṣadāṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptaye bhikṣūṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīnām upāsakānām upāsikānāṃ ca sarvasatvānāṃ ca dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya yogakṣemāya bhaviṣyati //
T02msitvatu:37: cili cili hili hili sumati vasumati /
T02msitvatu:43: hārīṭaki hārīṭaki kārīṭaki kārīṭaki kārīṭaki kārīṭaki /
T02msitvatu:88: guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ
T02msitvatu:89: viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca kurvantu jīvantu varṣaśataṃ
T02msitvatu:99: cara khara khara khuru khuru mati mati bhūmicaṇḍe /
T02msitvatu:108: cara nāḍi culu nāḍi culu nāḍi vāgbandhani /
T02msitvatu:122: curu curu phuru phuru rundha rundha dhare dhare vidhare vidhare viṣkambhani /
T02msitvatu:136: huru huru khuru khuru piṅgale namo 'stu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ svāhā //
T02msitvatu:137: asyāṃ khalu punā rāhula mahāśītavatīvidyāyāṃ daśottarapadaśatāyāṃ sūtre granthiṃ
T02msitvatu:138: baddhvā hastena dhāryamānāyāṃ kaṇṭhena dhāryamānāyāṃ samantād yojanaśatasya rakṣākṛtā bhaviṣyati (Mś_5) /
T02msitvatu:139: gandhair vā puṣpair vā mudrābhir vā naiva manuṣyo vāmanuṣyo vābhibhaviṣyati /
T02msitvatu:140: na śastraṃ na viṣaṃ na rogo na jvaro na prajvaro na vidyāmantro na vetāḍaḥ /
T02msitvatu:141: na vyādhinā nāgninā na viṣodakena kālaṃ kariṣyati /
T02msitvatu:142: vidyāmantraprayogānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ sādhuprayuktānāṃ cāsiddhānāṃ siddhakarī /
T02msitvatu:148: yo graho na muñcet saptadhāsya sphuṭen mūrdhā arjakasyeva mañjarī /
T02msitvatu:149: vajrapāṇiś cāsya mahāyakṣasenāpatir vajreṇādīptena prajvālitena ekajvālībhūtena tāvad vyāyacched yāvan mūrdhānaṃ sphoṭayet /
T02msitvatu:150: catvāraś ca mahārājāno 'yomayena cakreṇa mūrdhānaṃ sphoṭayeyuḥ /
T02msitvatu:151: kṣuradhārāprahāreṇa vināśayeyus tasmāc ca yakṣalokācyavanaṃ bhaveyuḥ /
T02msitvatu:153: atha khalu punā rāhula mahāśītavatīmahāvidyāyāṃ sakṛtparivartitāyāṃ rājacaurodakāgniviṣaśastrāṭavīkāntāramadhyagataḥ sarvabhayebhyaḥ parimucyate
T02msitvatu:155: ekanavatyāṃ gaṅgānadīvālukāsamair buddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitā bhāṣiṣyate bhāṣyate ca siddhā paramasiddhā siddhaparākramā /
T02msitvatu:157: sarvabhayopadraveṣu mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ kuru /
T02msitvatu:158: śivam ārogyam abhayaṃ ca sarvadā sarvathā sarvataḥ sarvāvasthāsu bhavantu //
T02msitvatu:159: idam avocat bhagavān āttamanā āyuṣmān rāhulaḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhabhāṣitam abhyanandann iti //
